name: BHB27-Kernel
long_description: BHB27-Kernel Custom Kernel for CM Based Roms. This will work on any CM Custom ROM today they are (CM12.1, Mokee, NX and RR) Be aware Mokee has its separate zip.
features: Check XDA thread for recomendations, help etc...

features.name: Main features
items: Many custom CPU GOV optimized for Krait 450
CPu Wakeup Boost and Hotplug Boost
Power suspend Mode, better deep sleep tool

downloads.name: V-1.1.2 - BHB27-Kernel For CM - RR - released in 11-05-2015
downloads.description: This zip is Only for CM12.1 - ResurrectionRemix ROM
changelog: Changelog:
CPU over clock 2841Mhz and 2880 MHz (This is probably the maximum overclock I'll release)
Frequency table adjustment:
Reduce the maximum current for each frequency. (less power use, more battery)

CPU voltages FIX this fix the bug of some device not having the default voltage table that is in the 2#post after boot. (if your device is not using the default table of second post, try a Data clean of kernel app and reboot, if that doesn't help try a clean install, if you don't wanna to do that just set the voltage by hand)
Minor updates so the kernel can keep up with the changes on the ROM's.

GCC compiler update and optimized to support android M (not really necessary right now, doesn't bring any noticeable improve to the kernel today, but is good to know that the compiler is ready and optimized for M).

downloads.name: V-1.1.2 - BHB27-Kernel For Mokee only- released in 11-05-2015
changelog: Changelog:
Same as above

downloads.name: V-1.1.1 - BHB27-Kernel For CM - RR- released in 10-30-2015
downloads.description: This zip is Only for CM12.1 - ResurrectionRemix ROM
changelog: Changelog:
To solve some random reboot that happens when using Data revert some changes made before the Moto 5.1.1 kernel update
Revert Heavy Hitter Filter and Proportional Integral Controller Enhanced network optimization algorithm.
Revert some USB changes

changelog: Changelog:
Same as above
